articles.title: Argentina’s World Cup-winning goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez to visit Kolkata - The Indian Express
articles.description: Martinez played a major role in Argentina's 2022 World Cup triumph in Doha under Lionel Messi's captaincy. He saved two penalty shots against Netherlands in an ill-tempered quarterfinal match and did the same against France in the summit clash.
